meanings.definition: The practice of refraining from indulging in excessive food or drink.
meanings.sent1: Her abstemiousness at the buffet impressed everyone with her self-control.
meanings.sent2: His abstemiousness at the party meant he only had a small plate of snacks.
meanings.sent3: Despite the tempting desserts, her abstemiousness prevailed, and she stuck to her diet.
meanings.sent4: His abstemiousness was like a shield against the allure of the overflowing wine glasses.
meanings.sent5: The monk's abstemiousness was legendary, as he never once gave in to gluttony.

meanings.definition: Moderation or restraint, especially in the consumption of alcohol.
meanings.sent1: The doctor advised him to practice abstemiousness to improve his health.
meanings.sent2: Her abstemiousness when it came to drinking was well-known among her friends.
meanings.sent3: His abstemiousness at the bar was so extreme that he only ordered water.
meanings.sent4: In a world of excess, her abstemiousness shone like a beacon of control.
meanings.sent5: The abstemiousness of the designated driver ensured a safe journey home for all.
